shopReview:
First Arabic Style Chill Bar in Yangon with Container/Rooftop and Indoor Dj Hall/Green Field.
They offer Best price with Excellent Services. The Bar(BurDubai) @Inya Road provides the Best Shisha in Town with Only 30,000 kyats with Free Special Smoothie. And the special Parata & Mutton dish is available Fri & Sat. They offer Special discount for Birthday Party(No Bottle charge/Free Arabic Dj Hall) and everyday has special complementary for every table. So you better RSVP for your table before you go!

shopReview:
Let your hair down and enjoy the night at Club Rizzoli. Sip your favourite cocktail , try something new from the sake bar and relax in the cozy atmosphere. If you’re one for /Sake Bar: Sake lovers now we have the choice of the dozens of different types of their favourite drinks at the lounge sake bar.
Cocktails Bar: Selection of house pouring spirits, liquors, wines and cocktails. Snacks : Tapas Selections, Balls and Bites set menu.
Cigar : Havana cigar from Cuba, ROMEO Y JULIETA , Cohiba,etc.
VIP Bar : Is a private and exclusive private venue for our VIPs. Karaoke : 4 VIP Karaoke Rooms with Multilingual Karaoke Songs.
Sports : 42? LCD featuring all your favourite sports.

shopReview: A forward thinking bar that brings a unique underground vibe and is committed to promoting a cool international sound to an eccentric mixed crowd.An intimate venue full of character with a slight industrial feel to it, similar to the underground warehouse parties in London. We tried to keep this industrial feel and added some new decor to liven it up even more. The club already boasts an impressive sound system and serious lighting setup which also makes for a truly unique experience at Flamingo Bar,We aim to create a real focus on the music and the entertainment aspects bringing a touch of the familiar from home for the expats, and a lot of new for the locals to create the perfect night out for all with a mix of house / tech / progressive / deep and live music. The bar / club is open 7 nights a week starting at 9:30pm till late and is also centrally located with easy access and lots of parking.

shopReview: Renovated and recently reopened, Salud offers an array of Latino dishes in a bohemian and rustic setting. Bric-a- brac objects of art adorn a brush stroke interior of red, gold and green beneath bronze colonial ceiling fans and light shades made from recycled bottles. The ambience leans towards a fun night out. A dangerous collection of rum and tequila is stacked high behind the bar while salsa and dance set the tone.

shopReview: Since 2009 in Singapore. Lime Spa is one of the best men's spa in Singapore and Myanmar. Try our signature fusion massage, a combination of Thai and Swedish which will give you a deeper level of relaxation. Our Philosophy Sincerity, Warmth and Hospitality are the traditional Asian values deeply rooted in our philosophy. Drawing from the therapeutic power of nature, we deliver an authentic experience that lifts up body and mind, the moment you enter our spa. Our Vision Creating nurturing well being spaces, where the ritual of a spa treatment is fundamental and exclusive...We believe that beauty is an inner "experience", a way of expression and giving value to our body. Core Values We are warm, approachable and giving. We offer a comforting touch which is genuine and sincere. Service Philosophy Warm and sincere personalized service that comes from the heart.
